pullRequest.title: [Alcor Integration]Port CURD - Bug Fix and New Route Manager APIs
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR proposes the following changes:

Optimized route manager service and added route with subnet/vpc related database tables
Modified issue in port manager
Successfully tested e2e integration

commit.message: update vpc puml and system flow adoc
Add vm/vpc workflows and puml template

Squashed commit of the following:

commit dec9dd9a7a80aabc9cb801b244d20e840b5ed206
Author: kaidong <shikaidong@126.com>
Date:   Sat May 9 12:06:38 2020 +0800

    [Alcor Tools] Set up a Swagger UI (#187)
Add a set of new workflows and start services docs
Clean node manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean mac manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean port manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean ip manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean route manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Add maven compile plugin to route pom
Clean subnet manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean vpc manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean API gateway pom.xml and modify docker file
Update pom for lib, web and all other services
Update schema pom files and add dependencies to all service pom
Temp disable mac manager UTs for further investigation
Outline design doc for dpm,mq,nhm,nmm, update controller and toc docs
add a temp vm_create puml under design and update puml file link in nova doc
Clean mac manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Clean vpc manager pom.xml and modify docker file
Update pom for lib, web and all other services
Update schema pom files and add dependencies to all service pom
Temp disable mac manager UTs for further investigation
Reorg design docs into an Antora-supported structure
update antora.yml and rename toc to index

Merge pull request #2 from xieus/docs/design

Docs/design
Move adoc files under pages folder
move image and workflow up to ROOT

nodes.bodyText: Create Issue #255 for tracking.
It seems that we didn't format this file using Ctrl+Shift+L :-)
This line of code is quite long and a bit buggy. Let us move it to an util method with appropriate check.
Please remove local change. We learned the lesson before :-)

commit.message: Replace neighborCache key with vpc id
Fix duplicated issue of port-SG binding
Revert GET SGs as used to build NetwworkConfiguration
Merge branch 'fix/pm_del_port' of https://github.com/xieus/alcor into integration_fix
Remove redundant neighbor_info for ports on the same host
Merge branch 'fix/pm_del_port' of https://github.com/xieus/alcor into integration_fix

nodes.bodyText:
We will need to add one more step of pushing container image to the "official" container registry in the CI workflow (for every PR merge) so that this yaml file could pull the latest "official" image.
Create an issue ##270 for tracking.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+apiVersion: v1
+kind: ConfigMap
+metadata:
+  name: sg-configmap
+data:
+  application.properties: |
+    ignite.host=10.99.135.32
+    ignite.port=10800
+---
+apiVersion: apps/v1
+kind: Deployment
+metadata:
+  labels:
+    app: sgmanager
+  name: sgmanager
+spec:
+  selector:
+    matchLabels:
+      app: sgmanager
+  replicas: 1
+  #replicas: 3
+  template:
+    metadata:
+      labels:
+        app: sgmanager
+    spec:
+      volumes:
+        - name: sg-volume
+          configMap:
+            name: sg-configmap
+            items:
+              - key: application.properties
+                path: application.properties
+      containers:
+        - image: zhonghaolyu/repo:sgKube1

nodes.bodyText: @kevin-zhonghao We may need to change the API doc if any.

Let us change the route manager exception handling in this PR.
One idea is to define different exception (each with specific error codes and message), and we could throw a specific exception instead of a general exception.
An example is Port Manager which defines 20+ different exceptions for various corner cases.
https://github.com/futurewei-cloud/alcor/tree/master/services/port_manager/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/portmanager/exception
Can we give a more specific exception here and similar other places?

quick question: why do we need two get methods,
getBySubnetId => to get SubnetToRouteMapper
getRuleBySubnetId => to get the real RouteEntity List
Why do we need the first get method?

In Route Manager ServiceImpl and repo classes, I don't find usage of a transaction.
Please find the reference implementation: 
  
    
      alcor/services/port_manager/src/main/java/com/futurewei/alcor/portmanager/repo/PortRepository.java
    
    
         Line 66
      in
      7c6f138
    
    
    
    

        
          
           public void createPortAndNeighbor(PortEntity portEntity, NeighborInfo neighborInfo) throws Exception { 
        
    
  


@kevin-zhonghao
We need to run Ctrl+Alt+L for proper code format. Seems that at least this file doesn't follow the formatting guidance.
Do we have other fastjson alternative to use?

Add comments if possible.
Think of moving these two to a common resource class.

+
+import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
+import lombok.Data;
+import org.springframework.data.annotation.CreatedDate;
+import org.springframework.data.annotation.LastModifiedDate;
+
+import java.util.List;
+import java.util.Map;
+
+@Data
+public class SubnetToRouteMapper {
+
+    @JsonProperty("subnet_id")
+    private String subnetId;
+
+    @JsonProperty("route_ids")
+    private List<String> routeIds;
+
+    @CreatedDate

commit.message: Update design documents and table of content
Start docs for comm and controller
Rename fast path file and start feature comparison
update rescue path needed change table
Finalize review section in data store
Add one item for node monitoring
Reorganize monitoring doc and update design doc metadata format
Add API workflow chart for creation of vpc, subnet and port
added - Reference: Neutron High Level Flow
Update ToC with microservice doc link
Update ToC and add vpc/mac manager design files
Merge mac manager design spec from eunju:feature/macmanager
Add references for OpenStack and Alcor
